A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie added so much to the star wars universe. It expiremented. This isn't the star wars I grew up with and that's not a bad thing. So many people want this to be the same as the original trilogy. Yet\, they complained when the force awakens did just that. I'm glad they are doing something new. I loved this film. Although\, the Finn and Rose story line was unneeded and the first act dragged a little.
